service_technical_inventory_description: We perform a detailed inspection of objects to create accurate technical passports that serve as the basis for further work.
service_construction_permits_description: We take on all the responsibilities for preparing necessary documents and interacting with government authorities.
service_commissioning_description: We ensure compliance with all requirements for obtaining certificates confirming the readiness of the facility for operation.
service_legal_help_description: Legal support, including consultations, legal analysis, and assistance in all aspects related to construction.
contact_us_description: Have questions about us or our services? Please reach out to us.
working_hours: We are available from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Friday.
address_text: Cherkasy, B. Vyshnevytskoho St., building 37, office 502
footer_about: Your home can do more. Ensuring quality and excellence every day.
